Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Congestive \Con*gest"ive\, a. (Med.) Pertaining to, indicating, or attended with, congestion in some part of the body; as, a congestive fever. [1913 Webster]
congestive adj : relating to or affected by an abnormal collection of blood or other fluid; "congestive heart desease"
